Eight Sense

Salut! My name is Fred. I am another French living Down Under. Until recently, I was a Research Scientist at the Centre for Astronomy and Supercomputing at Swinburne University of Technology.

There I spent time perfecting my knowledge about the Cosmos. Sadly, I did not mastered the Seventh and Eight Senses but I did learn quite a bit about Observational Astronomy, Quasar Spectroscopy, and the metallic enrichment of gaseous structures.

I am interested about Science and, since I spent a lot of my time behind a computer, programming in general. My lifeâ€™s goal is to positive societal impact by using all of the skills I have learned throughout my life.
